This ''FlexWidth'' plugin provides a handy machenism to ''flexibly tweak sidebar width'' for [[TiddlyWiki 5|http://tiddlywiki.com/]]. !!!Features # Add extra buttons next to system ~TopRightBar Icon, such as - `▼` `◀` {{$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu}} # `◀` / `▶` to toggle between default and custom sidebar width. # `▼` to select different sidebar width.

** Inspired by [[TW5 tristate Sidebar|http://tw5tristate.tiddlyspot.com/]]

!!!Install * Drag&Drop package -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth]] (with documentation)"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/stylesheet":{"created":"20140904154049029","creator":"EucalyJ","list-after":"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base","modified":"20141004024850657","modifier":"EucalyJ","sidebar-width":"30em","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/_flexwidth $:/_macros","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define if-fluid(text) <$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no"> <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/config!!sidebar-width" type="nomatch" text="default" default="default"> <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/config!!flex-width" type="match" text="+">$text$ \end <>"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/TopBarMenu":{"created":"20140904152757311","creator":"EucalyJ","list-before":"$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu","modified":"20140913000355649","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/tags/TopRightBar $:/_UI $:/_flexwidth $:/_macros","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/TopBarMenu","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no"> <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/config!!flex-width" type="match" text="-"> <$button set="$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/config!!flex-width" setTo="+" tooltip="Custom width" class="tc-btn-invisible">▶ <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/flexwidth/config!!flex-width" type="match" text="+" default="+"> <$button popup="$:/flexwidth-PopupState" tooltip="Select width" class="tc-btn-invisible">▼ <$reveal type="popup" state="$:/flexwidth-PopupState" position="below">
